title: The Future of Trade - CBAM - lessons learned and road ahead
author: unknown
text: As the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) continues to reshape the landscape of international trade and carbon accountability, understanding its evolving requirements is crucial for compliance and strategic planning. "CBAM: Lessons Learned and Road Ahead," taking place on 12 December 2024. This interactive session will provide a comprehensive overview of the current state of CBAM implementation, focusing on the key challenges and opportunities it presents.
